text:
Went to PHP.net reporting the bug (a limit on POST data when the actual limit is much higher).

After weeks of testing PHP oficials concluded that it's an Apache problem. So here I am! They wouldn't say something like this if they didn't know better.

The server: 
Centos, Apache 2.2.9, PHP 5.2.5.

The problem:
When posting data from page to page if the data exceeds about 6K it sends nothing. Everything in PHP is tuned perfectly, as PHP oficials confirm.

PHP oficials concluded that it has to do with Apache and some of it's modules.
